# NGC-SKR IAPETUS (UII Overhaul)
[color=#a4885c]Hull Configuration:[/color] Small, Port and Starboard Docking
[color=#a4885c]Crew Slots:[/color] 1 Pilot, 1 Research Director, 1 Engineer
[color=#a4885c]Power System:[/color] 1x SUPERPACMAN Uranium Generator
[color=#a4885c]Atmospherics:[/color] Gas Mixer, Premixed Air Connector
[color=#a4885c]Weapons:[/color] 2x L85 Autocannons
[color=#a4885c]IFF Designation:[/color] Civilian
"After aquiring the Iapetus Blueprints, Ursadyne Interstellar Industries has overhauled it with an improved layout and updated safety features."
# SHIP FEATURES
## 1. Bridge
## 1.1. Control Systems
- Unlock the Shuttle computer using your ID card. - Use the Station Records computer to open up slots for the other crew members. - The Gunnery Console can be used to control the ship's turrets. - The Holopad can be used to directly contact other ships or stations.
## 1.2. Safety Systems
- Check that the pilot's EVA locker is filled with a hardsuit, air tank, and mini-jetpack. - The button next to the windows can be used to toggle the shutters.
## 2. Science
## 2.1. Artifact Lab
- Artifacts can be found on wrecks in space - Use a Multitool to connect the Artifact Analyzer and the Analysis Console. - Check that the Research Director's locker is filled with a hardsuit, air tank, and mini-jetpack. - The Blast Door can be used to open the lab to space. It is opened with the button next to the lab door. - The Gas Pressure Pumps can be used to pump air into or out of the lab.
## 2.2 Research and Development
- The Research and Development console can be used to research new technologies. - The Research and Development Server can be used to store research data. - The Server is not limited to a single research focus, and can be linked to new machines.
## 2.3. Production
- The Protolathe can be used to produce researched items and components. - The Circuit Imprinter can be used to produce circuit boards for various machines. - The Autolathe can be used to produce a wide variety of basi items - The Exosuit Fabricator can be used to produce robotics and their components.
## 3. Engineering
## 3.1. Power System
- Check that the S.U.P.E.R.P.A.C.M.A.N. generator unit is anchored to the floor. - Check that the SMES unit is anchored to the floor. - Check that the Fuel Locker has spare fuel.
## 3.2. Atmospherics
- Set the Ships Air Alarms to Filtering (Wide) - Ensure that a gas canisters are wrenched to the connector ports. - Check that the air mixer is set to ~21% oxygen, ~79% nitrogen (Confirm Crew Biology). - Enable the gas pump into the distribution system. - The white Gas Connector can be used to connect premixed air canisters to the ship's atmospherics system.
## 3.3 Other Systems
- Check that the gyroscope is anchored, powered, and enabled. - Check that the mini gravity generator is anchored, powered, and enabled. - Check that the Engineering Locker has tools, a hardsuit, air tank, and a mini-jetpack.
